item.title: Aperture & f-number
item.description: I have been using DSLR for over 10 years, I thought I knew few knowledge about photography. But after I watched a wonderful online course of digital photography by Prof. Marc Levoy [1], I just found there were so many details I weren’t aware before. The thing embarrassed me the most was that I incorrectly related f-number to lens aperture size. This post is trying to introduce the idea of f-number starting from scene radiance.
